job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

jd: From: Ishavdeep Singh, Cloud Think Technologies ishavdeep@cloudthinktech.com Reply to: ishavdeep@cloudthinktech.com Duties:Design, develop, and maintain cloud infrastructure with a focus on the Microsoft security model and Azure Machine Learning components.Ensure the security, availability, and scalability of A.I. cloud-based systems.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement and maintain security controls and compliance with industry standards and regulations.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify, provision, and manage A.I. based cloud solutions that meet business requirements.Monitor and optimize cloud infrastructure to ensure optimal performance and cost-effectiveness.Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in Microsoft Azure’s A.I. cloud computing and security capabilities. Required Skills:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Strong experience with cloud computing, particularly with Microsoft Azure including Microsoft Machine Learning.Experience with Azure OpenAI and the related Azure Components.In-depth knowledge of the Microsoft security model and related technologies.Experience with implementing and maintaining security controls and compliance with industry standards and regulations.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team.Excellent communication and collaboration skills
